mapper.insert: insert into FcubeReply (CommntNo, Cubeuuid, Uid, Bgroup, Sorts, Depth, CommntText, CommntTime) values (#{commntno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sorts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commnttext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commnttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update FcubeReply set Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Bgroup = #{bgroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Sorts = #{sorts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Depth = #{depth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CommntText = #{commnttext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CommntTime = #{commnttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CommntNo = #{commntno,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select CommntNo, Cubeuuid, Uid, Bgroup, Sorts, Depth, CommntText, CommntTime from FcubeReply
